content.question: In lines 7-8 (“Comites . . . sinus"), Proserpina tells her companions to

choices.label: take her with them when they leave
come with her and gather ﬂowers
look at the meadow full of ﬂowers
smell the ﬂowers that fill the meadow

content.answer: come with her and gather ﬂowers

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
